Text: The CBN also held an OMO auction last week, offering a total of N300 billion across three instruments to keep system liquidity in check given huge inflows from maturities.
Effect: The CBN also held an OMO auction last week, offering a total of N300 billion across three instruments to keep system liquidity in check
Sentence: <e2>The CBN also held an OMO auction last week, offering a total of N300 billion across three instruments to keep system liquidity in check</e2> given <e1>huge inflows from maturities.</e1>
